com.tokelon.toktales.android.render.opengl.gl20

Class AndroidGL14

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tokelon.toktales.android.render.opengl.gl20.AndroidGL14
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGL, IGL14

    public class AndroidGL14
extends Object
implements IGL14
    Android OGL2 v1.4 implementation of OpenGL CompatWrapper.

    Note that for Android, values of large size types (double, long), may be cast down for specific functions.

                         float green,
                         float blue,
                         float alpha)
        Description copied from interface: IGL14

        Specifies the constant color Cc to be used in blending.
        Specified by:
        glBlendColor in interface IGL14

        red - the red color component
        green - the green color component
        blue - the blue color component
        alpha - the alpha color component

      • glBlendEquation

        public void glBlendEquation(int mode)
        Description copied from interface: IGL14

        Reference Page

        Controls the blend equations used for per-fragment blending.
        Specified by:
        glBlendEquation in interface IGL14
        Parameters:
        mode - the blend equation. One of:
        FUNC_ADDFUNC_SUBTRACTFUNC_REVERSE_SUBTRACTMINMAX

      • glBlendFuncSeparate

        public void glBlendFuncSeparate(int sfactorRGB,
                                int dfactorRGB,
                                int sfactorAlpha,
                                int dfactorAlpha)
        Description copied from interface: IGL14

        Reference Page

        Specifies pixel arithmetic for RGB and alpha components separately.
        Specified by:
        glBlendFuncSeparate in interface IGL14
        Parameters:
        sfactorRGB - how the red, green, and blue blending factors are computed. The initial value is GL_ONE.
        dfactorRGB - how the red, green, and blue destination blending factors are computed. The initial value is GL_ZERO.
        sfactorAlpha - how the alpha source blending factor is computed. The initial value is GL_ONE.
        dfactorAlpha - how the alpha destination blending factor is computed. The initial value is GL_ZERO.
